name: Candy blast 4
description:
Always match 4, NEVER match 3
This is a brand new and super awesome gameplay where you need to match 4 or more in order to get points,
if you match 3 you will get minus points.
Complete the levels and unlock new worlds along the way, there are several worlds and gameplay with 36 different levels on each world, can you match 4 on all of these ?

Collect stars and power ups, earn even more stars by invite your friends to play the game,
Share the score and play against awesome players from all over the world, who knows, maybe your name will be on top of the high score list?

Candy blast 4 - Match 4, never match 3
